item.description:
Come check out Conspiracy Cafe every Sunday from noon to 8!!!

The Conspiracy Cafe at 45 Mt. Auburn St. in Harvard Sq. is open every Sunday from noon to 8:00 pm. It offers a unique setting for 9/11 Truth activists and those curious to learn more about current events through books, DVDs, film screenings and informal discussions, in a casual cafe environment. The Conspiracy Cafe offers a wide selection of books, cds, & other media. So whether your desires are social, intellectual or oriented toward activism, the Conspiracy Cafe has something for everyone. Hope to see you at the next Conspiracy Cafe! So what are you waiting for? Bring a friend, bring yourself, bring an open mind! Come check out what Conspiracy Cafe is all about!

FILM LINEUP FOR THIS WEEK'S EDITION:

12:00 - 1:30 The Secret Government
Bill Moyer's 1987 scathing critique of the criminal subterfuge carried out by the Executive Branch of the US Government to carry out operations which are clearly contrary to the wishes and values of the American people. The thrust of the expos√© is the Iran-Contra arms and drug-running operations which flooded the streets of our nation with crack cocaine.
trailer

1:30 - 3:00 9/11 Mysteries
9/11 Mysteries demolishes the 'official' 9/11 conspiracy theory more graphically than any movie previously released. See for yourself what really happened in the 3 demolished buildings in the weeks before 9/11.
trailer

3:00 - 4:40 Who Killed John O Neil
Traumatized by the September 11th attacks, one man struggles to dismantle official history, at the expense of his sanity and even his life. Grappling with multiple realities - and multiple personalities - he must retreat into his mind in pursuit of the truth. In a fictional film about non-fictional events, there is a place where belief and faith will blind you, where nothing is sacred, and to get there all you have to do is ask: "Who Killed John O'Neill?"
trailer

4:45 - 5:35 Money As Debt

Debt - government, corporate and household has reached astronomical proportions. Where does all this money come from? How could there BE that much money to lend? The answer is: there isn't. Today, money IS debt. If there were NO DEBT there would be NO MONEY. This short clear, concise video explains the history of money & explains our debt based monetary system.
trailer

5:40 - 7:45 Police State 2000
For at least 10 years now, our local state & county police have been merging with the military more and more. This film demonstrates that scary phenomenon with footage of police working with foreign troops for martial law & processing people into FEMA centers. Now with legislation such as the John Warner Defense Reauthorization Act & the new Presidential Decision Directive 51 make that scary vision a reality.
trailer

We offer these DVDs at a nominal cost to pay for the renting of the democracy center & the cost of the raw materials needed for this to happen! We charge $2 for the first 5 dvds you get, then $1 for every additional dvd after you get 5. We also have a good supply of books & stuff too! Thanks again!

item.how_to_find_us: I'll be at the dvd table!
item.why: Come check out some documentaries in the screening room... Buy some cheap dvds & books! Meet other 9/11 truthers in your community!
